inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: comes to clinic with some general and non-specific bones and joints pain

inclusion.criterion: pre-dialysis blood pressure 120-160 mmHg in the last month prior to the initiation of study or recent (<1 Mo) addition of a new antihypertensive drug
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: iPTH at entry 200-800 pg/mL (as per severe hyperparathyroidism)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: lab study is remarkable for Vit D: 14ng/ml and otherwise healthy

exclusion.criterion: any severe, debilitating disease associated with a reduced survival
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: any major cardiovascular event in the last 12 month before study
exclusion.label: not_met
